message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal on a product that's worth a lot more to you than that.

I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it, but I need to stay within my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $825000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $825000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my initial offer and your offer. I'm proposing a price of $887500. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the value of the product. I believe it's worth considering.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $825000 is still a bit too high for me. Can we try to get even closer to my target price? I'd be willing to meet you at $850000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand your concerns and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to reduce the price to $900000, which is still a significant discount from my initial offer. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit above the price you're offering. I'm willing to meet you at my previous offer of $850000. I'm not willing to go any higher, and I'm starting to consider buying from John for $1200000 if we can't come to an agreement.
